import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from 'src/app/services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { datas: any = []; constructor(private service: DataService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.service.getdetails().subscribe((data) => { console.log(typeof data); this.datas = data; }) } getdet(Id) { this.service.getdetails().subscribe((data) => { console.log(typeof data); data.find(o=>o.Id === Id) }) } }
